CmdLine: apk --update add libmcrypt-dev autoconf gcc libc-dev make pcre-dev zip zlib-dev git nodejs npm && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* &&     docker-php-ext-install mbstring &&     docker-php-ext-install pcntl &&     docker-php-ext-install pdo_mysql &&     docker-php-ext-install opcache &&     pecl install apcu &&     echo "extension=apcu.so" > /usr/local/etc/php/conf.d/apcu.ini &&     curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php -- --install-dir=/usr/bin --filename=composer &&     composer global require hirak/prestissimo
Commands.Name: run
